tool_description: Generates comprehensive analytics and insights from payment transaction data including trends, performance metrics, and business intelligence.

start_date.description: Analysis start date in YYYY-MM-DD format

end_date.description: Analysis end date in YYYY-MM-DD format

merchant_ids.description: List of merchant IDs to analyze

metrics.description: Metrics to calculate: volume, success_rate, avg_amount, decline_rate, refund_rate, processing_time, fraud_rate, chargeback_rate

group_by.description: Grouping dimension: day, week, month, gateway, payment_method, country

error_messages: Invalid date range: End date must be after start date and both must be valid dates.
Date range too large: Maximum analysis period is 365 days.
No merchants specified: At least one merchant ID must be provided.
Invalid metrics: Use valid metric names from the supported list.
Invalid grouping: Use one of [day, week, month, gateway, payment_method, country].
Insufficient data: Not enough transaction data for meaningful analysis.
usage: Specify start_date, end_date, merchant_ids, and desired metrics. Configure group_by, include_trends, and benchmark_comparison for detailed analysis.

trend_data.description: Time series data for trend analysis

top_performing_segments.description: Best performing segments by selected grouping

benchmark_scores.description: Performance scores compared to industry benchmarks
